about_the_game:
Survive the Unthinkable. Escape the Inescapable. Leave the Harvester's Shrine.
Trapped on a desolate island shrouded in darkness, you awaken to an overwhelming sense of dread. You don’t know how you got here, but one thing is clear—this is no ordinary island. Malevolent entities stalk the shadows, watching your every move. Your only hope? A broken-down boat that might be your ticket to freedom… if you can find its missing parts scattered across the island.

The island is vast, with dense forests, treacherous cliffs, a lost village, and forgotten ruins. Every step takes you deeper into its mysteries, but beware—its inhabitants do not take kindly to intruders.

Your stamina and the flashlight's battery are your lifelines. Run too much, and exhaustion will make you vulnerable. Let the light fade, and the darkness becomes your worst enemy. If you hear any weird noise, you better use all you've got.

The boat is your salvation, but its parts are hidden in the most unlikely and dangerous places. Your journey will test your wits, courage, and survival instincts. Can you piece together the escape plan and make it off the island? Or will the malevolent forces, the Harvesters that haunt this place claim you as their own?

Warning: This game may contain jump scares and/or elements that could make you feel uncomfortable.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: intel i5-13400F or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce RTX 2060 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: « How the hell did I get there ?  My boat is broken and they say this island is cursed. »Explore the landscape and collect everything you need to leave this place. Toggle your torchlight to reveal danger and avoid any contact with what they call « The Harvester ».
